author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MAJOR HURRICANE BERYL IS APPROACHING THE YUCATAN PENINSULA... ...HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED TO BEGIN OVERNIGHT...
summary:
...MAJOR HURRICANE BERYL IS APPROACHING THE YUCATAN PENINSULA... ...HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED TO BEGIN OVERNIGHT...
 As of 10:00 PM CDT Thu Jul 4
 the center of Beryl was located near 19.6, -85.5
 with movement W at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 964 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.
